旅英华侨华人和留学人员是中英关系的参与者、建设者和受益者，中英关系的未来发展离不开大家的大力支持。中国驻英国使馆愿与大家共树中英交流新形象，共促中英合作新进展，共筑祖国统一和民族复兴新辉煌。
驻英国使馆作为中国历史上第一个驻外外交机构，见证了中英关系百年沧桑。中国政府历来重视发展中英关系。我们愿同英方一道努力，在相互尊重、平等相待、包容互鉴基础上，推动中英关系健康稳定向前发展。

一代代旅居英国华侨华人和留学人员心系桑梓，始终关心支持中国的革命、建设、改革开放和统一大业，在不同历史时期发挥了独特作用，作出了突出贡献。大家积极参与旅居国建设，在中英之间架起友谊和合作的桥梁，赢得了英国各界的尊重和赞誉。

To advance intl arms control, disarmament & non-proliferation, intl community needs to jointly maintain global strategic stability, observe intl arms control treaties, resolve non-proliferation issues through negotiation, & improve global security governance in new frontiers.

China never shirks its intl obligations in the areas of disarmament and arms control, and has always kept its nuclear capabilities at the minimum level required for national security, and does not compete with any other country in the size or scale of nuclear force.

China has pledged not to use nuclear weapons first at any time or under any circumstances & is committed to a policy of not using or threatening to use nuclear weapons against non-nuclear-weapon States and nuclear-weapon-free zones unconditionally.

China has the most stable, consistent & predictable nuclear policy among all nuclear-weapon States. Since day one of possessing nuclear weapons, China has stood for complete prohibition & thorough destruction of nuclear weapons worldwide.

Hence the farce known as “Uygur Tribunal” is not only an act of slander and provocation to #China’s Xinjiang but also a violation of international law. It is a blatant affront to all the victims of genocide in history.

As an illegal organization set up by western anti-China politicians, certain lawyers and the “World Uygur Congress”, the “Uygur Tribunal” has no right to hold a “hearing”, let alone making any decision on any serious allegations.

The courts of a few countries have conducted trials of genocide that had happened in those countries. Otherwise, no country, organization or individual is qualified or has the right to make determination of the crime against other countries.

As stipulated in the Convention, cases of genocide are under the jurisdiction of the competent court of the country where the crime occurs, or adjudicated by the International Criminal Court, the jurisdiction of which is accepted by the State Party concerned.

Since the birth of the Convention, most cases of genocide have been determined by the International Court of Justice established in accordance with the Convention or the Special Court authorized by the UN Security Council.

According to the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide, international law, international custom & relevant cases, crime of genocide, being the most serious international crime, requires authoritative & strict legal procedures before being declared.

The so-called “Uygur Tribunal” has no legal basis or authority according to international law. The trial of the so-called "genocide" by such a pseudo court is nothing but a clumsy trick under the guise of law, trying to propagate rumours about #China. https://t.co/YBTeyNgPjz
